Goldthrone Seamstress.name: Goldthrone Seamstress
Goldthrone Seamstress.oracle:
Flying
Whenever another nontoken creature you control enters, create a colorless artifact Equipment token named Scissors with equip 2 and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1."

Shadewood Guards.name: Shadewood Guards
Shadewood Guards.oracle:
Flying
Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact or creature. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Shadewood Guards.adventure_oracle: Each opponent loses 1 life. Create a Blood token.

Blessings of Naminé.name: Blessings of Naminé
Blessings of Naminé.oracle: Each player draws two cards, then each opponent discards two cards.

Impulsive Tutor.name: Impulsive Tutor
Impulsive Tutor.oracle: Search your library for a card, exile it, then shuffle. You may play that card this turn.

ParaMox.name: ParaMox
ParaMox.oracle: {T}: Add one mana of any color. You can't use this mana to cast spells from your hand.
